The photograph was taken by George Walke: 3, 2020, during Gov. Bill Lee's State of the State address.
The photograph is genuine: showing Tennessee state Rep. Kent Calfee drinking from a chocolate syrup bottle.
Calfee clarified that he was not drinkin: He repurposed the syrup bottle as a water bottle.
Calfee explained that he and his wife be: which is why he chose to use the chocolate syrup bottle as a water bottle instead of buying a new one.
